front.title: A Usage of Resource Location and Discovery (RELOAD) for Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) Verification

abstract.t: Verification Involving PSTN Reachability (ViPR) is a technique for inter-domain SIP federation. ViPR makes use of the RELOAD protocol to store unverified mappings from phone numbers to RELOAD nodes, with whom a validation process can be run. This document defines the usage of RELOAD for this purpose.
